author: isaww ify
comment: The actual appointments are costly and I was not able to see a doctor from Colorado via video chat for diagnosis

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi Isaww ify. Thank you for sharing your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you were unable to speak with a doctor. Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com so we can assist you with consulting with a HealthTap doctor.  Thank you.- The HealthTap Team

author: G Deann
comment: I don't care for the app too much

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi G Deann. I'm sorry to hear you were not delighted with your HealthTap experience. It is our goal to provide quality service and 100% satisfaction. I'd love to learn more about your experience. Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com. Thank you- The HealthTap Team

author: geno bates
comment: Great app to get  info from dr.s

author: Rosa Taisague
comment: Very informative

author: Jerisha Gleaton
comment: I love it. Didn't have to go to the ER. Very helful!!

author: Michelle ishappy
comment: There's some explanations on side effects, which is what I am looking for. Also they mention another app that tracks restaurant foods by ingredients such as milk. I want that app, but apparently it is only available for iPhones and I have an Android (Samsung Galaxy S7). Perhaps they will make the app for us Android users asap.

author: Susy Jimenez
comment: I'm not going to be paying for this after my trial ends, as it shuts down every time a consult begins. Doesn't let me do a thing. I already paid 19.99 and I'm asking for a refund.

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi Susy. I'm sorry to hear you were not satisfied with your HealthTap experience. It is our goal to provide quality service and 100% satisfaction. I'd love to learn more about your experience so that I can help resolve any underlying issues. Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com for further assistance. Thank you- The HealthTap Team

author: Ms Bull
comment: Invaluable. So glad it was created. Really allowed me to put my mind at ease if I'm not sure if I should visit the doctor

author: Mehwish Qureshi
comment: It is really. Help ful

author: Amit Ranjan
comment: This is one of the best apps to get Doctors opinion.  Working as expected

author: Blaze Wrangler
comment: Honestly marvelous

author: Brandon O'tinger
comment: Pretty good app, I've not done any of the "Concierge" or paid questions, but they are food about answering the free questions in a reasonable time. Pretty good to have when you are on the fence about going to the Dr on certain things

author: Tierra Nauman
comment: Very helpful. Love the app, I love to ask questions that I'm courious about it if I need a second opinion on what could be wrong.

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi Tierra thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you are disappointed with your HealthTap experience concerning the insurance and the cost. Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com so we can learn more about your particular needs.Thank you- The HealthTap Team

comment: Keep getting notifications, yet clk on it, and always goes to settings page. Never to Dr's answer.

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi. Thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear the links are not directing you to the correct locations.  I've shared this with our techs to help resolve the underlying cause. In the mean time, I'd love to learn more about your experience. Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com so we can assist you further. Thank you.The HealthTap Team

author: Andy Cam
comment: Great ap for being able to talk to a local doctor who has access to my medical history

author: Kevin Emr
comment: The Dr. Was helpful with my cold and followed up with a checklist of actions.
This app is easy and very helpful. Love it!!

author: Jayne Cox
comment: Very helpful information

author: Rami Khazaal
comment: Nice and useful. Thank you.

author: TONY CAPONE
comment: Excellent app

author: Strawberry Milk
comment: Works great until you try to talk to a doctor. When you type your question it has a delay on your typing and then freezes and locks the phone up to which point you have to restart the phone if you try to go back if you made a mistake while typing.  Not worth the download as that is the main feature of the app. I have an Asus zenphone selfie if anybody cares.

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi Strawberry Milk. Thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you were unable to complete your consultation with the doctor. We'd like to take a closer look into the issue you described. Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com so we can help resolve any underlying issues. Thank you. The HealthTap Team

author: Marcy Snyder
comment: Very helpful. I got the care that I needed and am finally starting to feel like myself. Great App

author: Martí carbo
comment: It makes me more headache

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi Marti. Thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear that you were not happy with our service. I'd love to learn more about your experience as we are always looking to improve our services. Please reach out to us at support@healthtap.com so I can assist you with your account. I look forward to your reply. Thank you. The HealthTap Team.

author: Ka'Shayla Abraham
comment: Getting connected with someone is easy. The doctors are like doctors you would see inperson. I am really satisfied with this app.

author: Natasha
comment: Amazing service. Low prices

author: Shahbaz Kibria
comment: Good app.

author: Jhinuk Palash
comment: Very helpful

author: Mariam Jones
comment: The information is very generic. And to get a more detailed answer, you must pay for a consult with a doctor. The free subscription is useless and the prime is expensive considering what you get. Also very hard to cancel before the free trial ends

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi Mariam. Thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you were not delighted with HealthTap's services. I'm unsure from some of your feedback which comments applied to the basic and the premium services. I'd love to learn more about your experience so I can better assist you. Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com. Thank you. HT Team

author: Robert Kowk
comment: Post your question, and a doctor will post an answer. It's fast for a question-answer app. Response times to my questions seem to range from 10 minutes to 10 hours. The site's doctors also have a premium service where you can see a real, live doctor on screen via a virtual appointment, and get a diagnosis and maybe a prescription (but not drugs like narcotics or anxiety drugs). The app is free for posting general medical questions. The one-on-one consultations have a fee, and you can select between primary care or specialists.

author: Lina Echeverri
comment: Love it! this is a great service.  It's quick, right when you need it, no long waits in the ER. I am fan because it helps to solve minor situations, aches and pains.  Also helps to guide when something more severe happens. They can even send prescriptions to my pharmacy. It saves me time, reduces stress and makes my life easier!

author: john smith
comment: Experienced doctors that can provide you with answers, usually in a day or less, and it's a major help with anxiety.

author: pooja das
comment: I thought it was free. what about people like us who don't have a card. I was excited. I know u wont treat for free.

reply.author: HealthTap
reply.content: Hi Pooja. Thank you for your feedback.  HealthTap does offer a free service. There are also premium services that can be used if you prefer to have a more interactive experience with the doctor.Please connect with us at support@healthtap.com for help with submitting questions through our free service. Thank you. The HealthTap Team

author: Tmh Ranapia
comment: Really awesome app

author: Zahra Adeel
comment: Awesome app

author: cassara cook
comment: Great app. The prime feature is kind of expensive, but you can ask free questions and get personalized answers from real doctors which is awesome. You can also connect with your own doctors if they use the app so it's a really cool way to stay connected with them if you have chronic health issues.

author: Daniel J. Phillips
comment: In this case, not so much the app as the web site; I've just installed the app. I just had a very significant health issue, and counsel I found at the web site was very helpful in getting past it. Earlier, I had a drug-interaction question and was able to get a quick, helpful answer from a doc at the site. So my five stars are really for the resource that HealthTap is.
The app is very useful.It would be great if u release an app for Indian customers and with Indian currency for premium services.

author: Dracapella de Pointe du Lac
comment: This app is very useful, just wish it wasn't so damn expensive! 😞

author: Hope West
comment: Love this app.Free and immediate help from the doctors.Thank you for this awesome time and trip saver.

author: Ahmad M. Umar
comment: No online Health App compares to this...
